name: Gold Rush (D00C)
description:
You are inside a collapsing gold mine, collect as much gold as you can and reach the stairs out of the mine before it comes down on you

Use WASD or the arrow keys to move around and the space bar to mine the block in front of you

Here is a Video from Codoor_'s stream playing it https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1099833324
